plot: To help a woman whose purse has been snatched, two college boys stage a murder scene and trap the purse snatcher.
title: A New Trick
plot_es: To help a woman whose purse has been snatched, two college boys stage a murder scene and trap the purse snatcher.
plot_en: To help a woman whose purse has been snatched, two college boys stage a murder scene and trap the purse snatcher.
